name: Nooit Gedacht Heritage Hotel (Original Dutch Governors House)
address:
Unawatuna, 80000 Unawatuna, Sri Lanka
Excellent location — rated 9.2/10!(score from 711 reviews)
Real guests • Real stays • Real opinions
description:
Housed in a restored Dutch colonial building, Nooit Gedacht Heritage Hotel features 2 swimming pools, a huge garden and free parking on site. Ayurvedic treatments are available. WiFi is available for free in the property's reception area, lobby and restaurant.

Guest rooms are fitted with a private veranda with views of the pool, lake or mountain. The en suite bathroom comes with toiletries and hot shower.

Guests can enjoy massages at the Ayurvedic spa. The staff at the tour desk can assist with making travel arrangements.

The on-site restaurant serves a variety of local dishes. Guests can also enjoy meals in the comfort of their own rooms.

A 10-minute walk from Unawatuna Beach, Hotel Nooit Gedacht Heritage is 5 km from the Galle Fortress and 119 km from Colombo. Bandaranaike International Airport is 149 km away.

Mini fridge is only available in the Superior Room. Guests can have their meals Buffet OR A ' la Carte at the Governor's Cafe. We serve a wide range of dishes Eastern & Western. Hotel has a Gym, Pool side Bar and a Herbal Spa.

description:
Elegant Accommodation: Anara Villa in Unawatuna offers adults-only guest house accommodation with a spa, sun terrace, and lush garden. Guests enjoy free WiFi, bicycle parking, and free use of bicycles.

Comfortable Amenities: The property features a restaurant, private check-in and check-out, beauty services, and wellness packages. Additional facilities include an indoor and outdoor play area, picnic area, and outdoor dining area.

Prime Location: Located a few steps from Talpe Beach and 3 km from Koggala Airport, Anara Villa is near attractions such as Galle Fort and Galle Light House. Scuba diving and surfing are available in the surroundings.

Guest Satisfaction: Highly rated for beach access, attentive staff, and room cleanliness, Anara Villa ensures a comfortable and memorable stay.

name: Nooit Gedacht Holiday Resort Unawatuna
address:
No. 213, Matara Road, Unawatuna, 80600 Unawatuna, Sri Lanka
After booking, all of the property’s details, including telephone and address, are provided in your booking confirmation and your account.
description:
Nooit Gedacht Holiday Resort is an affordable accommodation located just 600 metres from the beautiful Unawatuna Beach. Authentic Sri Lankan meals can be enjoyed at the private dining area.

Rooms will provide you with a seating area and mosquito nets. Featuring hot-water showers, the en suite bathrooms also come with free toiletries. You can also enjoy panoramic mountain views from the rooms.

Nooit Gedacht Holiday Resort is located 20 metres from the scenic Rumassala Mountain and 800 metres from Unawatuna Railway Station. Bandaranaike International Airport is approximately 140 km away.

Guests will find a cosy garden and outdoor terrace where a cup of coffee can be enjoyed. Other facilities include a tour desk, luggage storage space and car rental services. In-room dining options are available as well.

description:
Comfortable Accommodation: Asantha Guest House in Unawatuna offers family rooms with private bathrooms and air-conditioning. Each room includes a private entrance, ensuring a relaxing stay.

Dining and Amenities: Guests can enjoy British and local cuisines at the on-site restaurant. The property features a garden, outdoor dining area, and free WiFi. Additional facilities include a shared kitchen, private check-in and check-out, and free on-site parking.

name: Dunes Unawatuna Hotel
address:
65b, Wella Dewalaya Rd,, 80600 Unawatuna, Sri Lanka
Excellent location — rated 9.7/10!(score from 543 reviews)
Real guests • Real stays • Real opinions
description:
Sri Lankan architectural master piece Dunes Unawatuna hotel is an eco friendly boutique hotel near the beautiful Unawatuna beach(100 meters/ 5min walk away).

Dunes has 10 garden-view ac rooms and a 2 bed room ac cottage in its peaceful and  tranquil setting.

Dunes offers free Wi-Fi in all rooms and public areas, air-conditioning/fan, hot water, tea/coffee ,rain showers and toiletries, water bottles, Safes, car parking,free beach towels and continental and Sri Lankan delights for breakfast.

Railway station and bus station of Unawatuna is 200 meters away from the property and the Galle fort is 5km away.

Airport transfers to and from hotel, round  tours, free luggage storage, laundry, currency exchange, facilities are all available.
